About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a full-stack web developer dedicated to building engaging and responsive web applications. My expertise includes TypeScript, React.js, Redux, Node.js, Express, HTML, CSS, Tailwind, and Git. As a fast learner, I continuously seek to enhance my knowledge and skills. I thrive in collaborative environments and am eager to partner with others to develop outstanding applications.
